content: this pdf crochet pattern is for a small crocheted peacock feather which looks fabulous in all kinds of colour combinations i can imagine you might want to use them to make earrings garlands or to decorate box lids notebook covers or laptop / tablet sleeves to name but a few possibilities and they make lovely birthday teacher holiday or housewarming gifts pattern includes 1 clear written instructions in bullet point format 2 stitch chart 3 us and uk crochet terms dutch version also available 4 details on scheepjes catona yarn and the colours i used yarn scheepjes catona 100% mercerized cotton feather measurement approx 4 x 5cm / 1 6 x 2in level beginners this pattern is also available for free on my blog see my shop for more pdf crochet pattern tutorials i have quite a few peacock design patterns and more are on the way http //www etsy com/shops/thecuriocraftsroom copyright information © christa veenstra 2015 when you buy my original design patterns feel free to sell the items that you make from them you bought them so do with the finished items what you want i do want to ask you though that you credit me for the design with a link to my shop especially when selling the items online please note that it is not allowed to sell or distribute my patterns to others they are for personal use only for that would be an infringement of copyright thank you christa
